creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: alms plate with broad rim and reeded edge; Townsend Eyre coat-of-arms engraved on rim (see last card and letter in accession file)
inscription:
Marks

Engraved on border of plate, the arms of Eyre.
markings: mark on rim opposite coat-of-arms: <I.C.>, a pellet between fleur-de-lis below, in shield
text: This plate is engraved on the broad brim with the Eyre family coat of arms.
title: Alms plate
